ImyaTweaks.Title: Change the Range of the Big Firestation.
ImyaTweaks.Description: You can Increase or Decrease the Ranges of the Big Firestation onLand and Water

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Fire Distance for the Big Firestation
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Fire Distance for the Big Firestation ( Mod default settings = 24 )

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom Explosion Distance for the Big Firestation
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the Explosion Distance for the Big Firestation ( Mod default settings = 15 )
